welcome: Welcome to the V&R Spedition assistant bot.
welcome_driver:
Welcome, driver %s
What would you like to do?
welcome_manager:
Welcome, manager %s
What would you like to do?
gotta_register:
You are not a driver in the system. Most likely something is wrong with the bot. If nothing works â€“ write to the manager or developer (@NazKan_Uk | @pinkfloydfan). 

If you are not registered, do it using the /start command, this will most likely solve the problem
gotta_startday: You must start your shift before performing any actions. You can do this through the menu (commands /start or /menu)
gotta_be_manager: The user must be a manager to use this command
shipment_already_started: This route has already been started
shipment_has_not_started: This route has not been started yet, it cannot be finished
shipment_already_ended: This route has already been finished
shipment_has_not_ended: This route has not been finished yet
cannot_get_shipment_back: More than 10 minutes have passed, it is impossible to undo the route completion
manager:shipment_sent: âœ… Task has been sent to the driver!
select_receiver: Who would you like to send the message to?
user_exists: Such a user most likely already exists. If this is a mistake â€“ contact the developer: @pinkfloydfan or @NazKan_Uk
err_not_admin: You are not an administrator to perform this action
err_car_exists: Such a vehicle already exists in the database
added_car: Vehicle %s with mileage %d has been successfully added to the database
which_driver: Which driver are you sending the shipment to
shipment_end: Route %d has been finished! You have 10 minutes to undo this by pressing the button below
register: Register to unlock the main bot functions as a Driver or Manager.
registration_accepted:driver: Your registration has been accepted! You have been assigned vehicle %s with mileage %d km.
registration_accepted:drivertoSA: User %s has been approved as a driver!
registration_accepted:managertoSA: User %s has been approved as a manager!
registration_declined:SA: User %s registration has not been approved.
registration_declined:user: Your registration has not been accepted. Contact one of the managers directly or try again.
